Class Sha512

java.lang.Object

          com.safenetinc.luna.provider.digest.BaseHash
              com.safenetinc.luna.provider.digest.Sha512
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Sha512
extends BaseHash

Implementation of SHA2-3 [SHA-512] per the IETF Draft Specification.

References:

  1. Descriptions of SHA-256, SHA-384, and SHA-512,
  2. http://csrc.nist.gov/cryptval/shs/sha256-384-512.pdf

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
